findings.title: The minting logic of the vault token fails to work properly
findings.description: Due to an error in the ratio calculation logic, the minting of the Vault token may not be performed properly.

findings.title: The MultiStrategy#withdrawAllToVault() function fails to work properly
Hardcoded Array Length
findings.description: The functions traverse the vault's underlyings and perform specific actions using a hardcoded constant of 3 instead of the actual length of the vault's underlyings array, which can trigger unintended behavior when the length is not 3.

findings.title: Improper Strategy Migration
findings.description: When changing the active strategy of OneRingVault contract, proper migration from the old strategy to the new strategy may fail to occur, causing users to withdraw abnormally after the migration.

findings.title: Inaccurate Deposit Amount per Strategy
findings.description: When a disabled strategy exists during OneRingVault operation utilizing MultiStrategy, the amount deposited per strategy may be inaccurate due to the disabled strategy participating in totalAllocPoint calculation.

findings.title: The withdrawToVault function withdraws abnormal values to the vault
findings.description: The withdrawToVault function has an issue where it withdraws abnormal values to the vault.

findings.title: No syntax approves the asset to the router in OneRingVault#addUnderlying() function
findings.description: The OneRingVault#addUnderlying() function adds a new address to the vault's underlyings without calling IERC20(_asset).safeApprove(router, 0) and IERC20(_asset).safeApprove(router, uint256(-1)) functions in the strategy, which may cause deposit not to be completed normally.
